speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I will not lend thee a penny.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Why then, the world’s mine oyster, which I

speaker: PISTOL
text: with sword will open.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Not a penny. I have been content, sir, you

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: should lay my countenance to pawn. I have grated

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: upon my good friends for three reprieves for you

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and your coach-fellow Nym, or else you had

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: looked through the grate like a gemini of baboons.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I am damned in hell for swearing to gentlemen my

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: friends you were good soldiers and tall fellows.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: And when Mistress Bridget lost the handle of her

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: fan, I took ’t upon mine honor thou hadst it not.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Didst not thou share? Hadst thou not fifteen

speaker: PISTOL
text: pence?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Reason, you rogue, reason. Think’st thou I’ll

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: endanger my soul gratis? At a word, hang no more

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: about me. I am no gibbet for you. Go—a short

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: knife and a throng—to your manor of Pickt-hatch,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: go. You’ll not bear a letter for me, you rogue? You

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: stand upon your honor? Why, thou unconfinable

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: baseness, it is as much as I can do to keep the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: terms of my honor precise. Ay, ay, I myself sometimes,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: leaving the fear of God on the left hand

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and hiding mine honor in my necessity, am fain to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: shuffle, to hedge, and to lurch; and yet you, rogue,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: will ensconce your rags, your cat-a-mountain

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: looks, your red-lattice phrases, and your bold beating

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: oaths under the shelter of your honor! You will

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: not do it? You?

speaker: PISTOL
text: I do relent. What would thou more of man?

speaker: ROBIN
text: Sir, here’s a woman would speak with you.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Let her approach.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Give your Worship good morrow.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Good morrow, goodwife.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Not so, an ’t please your Worship.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Good maid, then.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: I’ll be sworn—as my mother was,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: the first hour I was born.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I do believe the swearer. What with me?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Shall I vouchsafe your Worship a

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: word or two?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Two thousand, fair woman, and I’ll vouchsafe

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thee the hearing.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: There is one Mistress Ford, sir—I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: pray, come a little nearer this ways. I myself dwell

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: with Master Doctor Caius.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, on. “Mistress Ford,” you say—

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Your Worship says very true. I pray

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: your Worship, come a little nearer this ways.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I warrant thee, nobody hears. Mine own

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: people, mine own people.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Are they so? God bless them and

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: make them His servants!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, “Mistress Ford”—what of her?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Why, sir, she’s a good creature.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Lord, Lord, your Worship’s a wanton! Well, heaven

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: forgive you and all of us, I pray!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: “Mistress Ford”—come, “Mistress Ford”—

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Marry, this is the short and the long

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: of it: you have brought her into such a canaries as

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: ’tis wonderful. The best courtier of them all, when

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: the court lay at Windsor, could never have brought

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: her to such a canary. Yet there has been knights,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: and lords, and gentlemen, with their coaches, I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: warrant you, coach after coach, letter after letter,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: gift after gift, smelling so sweetly—all musk—and

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: so rushling, I warrant you, in silk and gold, and in

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: such alligant terms, and in such wine and sugar of

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: the best and the fairest, that would have won any

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: woman’s heart; and, I warrant you, they could

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: never get an eye-wink of her. I had myself twenty

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: angels given me this morning, but I defy all angels

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: in any such sort, as they say, but in the way of

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: honesty. And, I warrant you, they could never get

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: her so much as sip on a cup with the proudest of

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: them all. And yet there has been earls—nay, which

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: is more, pensioners—but, I warrant you, all is one

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: with her.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: But what says she to me? Be brief, my good

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: she-Mercury.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Marry, she hath received your letter,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: for the which she thanks you a thousand times,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: and she gives you to notify that her husband will

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: be absence from his house between ten and eleven.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ten and eleven?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Ay, forsooth; and then you may come

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: and see the picture, she says, that you wot of. Master

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Ford, her husband, will be from home. Alas, the

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: sweet woman leads an ill life with him. He’s a very

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: jealousy man. She leads a very frampold life with

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: him, good heart.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ten and eleven. Woman, commend me to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: her. I will not fail her.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Why, you say well. But I have another

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: messenger to your Worship. Mistress Page

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: hath her hearty commendations to you too; and,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: let me tell you in your ear, she’s as fartuous a civil

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: modest wife, and one, I tell you, that will not miss

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: you morning nor evening prayer, as any is in Windsor,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: whoe’er be the other. And she bade me tell

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: your Worship that her husband is seldom from

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: home, but she hopes there will come a time. I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: never knew a woman so dote upon a man. Surely, I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: think you have charms, la! Yes, in truth.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Not I, I assure thee. Setting the attraction of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my good parts aside, I have no other charms.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Blessing on your heart for ’t!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: But I pray thee, tell me this: has Ford’s wife

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and Page’s wife acquainted each other how they

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: love me?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: That were a jest indeed! They have

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: not so little grace, I hope. That were a trick indeed!

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: But Mistress Page would desire you to send her

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: your little page, of all loves. Her husband has a

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: marvelous infection to the little page; and, truly,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Master Page is an honest man. Never a wife in

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Windsor leads a better life than she does. Do what

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: she will, say what she will, take all, pay all, go to

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: bed when she list, rise when she list—all is as she

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: will. And, truly, she deserves it, for if there be a

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: kind woman in Windsor, she is one. You must send

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: her your page, no remedy.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Why, I will.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Nay, but do so then, and, look you,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: he may come and go between you both. And in any

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: case have a nayword, that you may know one another’s

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: mind, and the boy never need to understand

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: anything; for ’tis not good that children

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: should know any wickedness. Old folks, you know,

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: have discretion, as they say, and know the world.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Fare thee well. Commend me to them both.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
There’s my purse.
                 
                (
                He
                 
                gives
                 
                her
                 
                money
                .
                )
               I am yet

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thy debtor.—Boy, go along with this woman.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: This news distracts

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: me.

speaker: PISTOL
text:
This
               
              punk
               
              is
               
              one
               
              of
               
              Cupid’s
               
              carriers
              .

speaker: PISTOL
text:
Clap
               
              on
               
              more
               
              sails
              ,
               
              pursue
              ;
               
              up
               
              with
               
              your
               
              fights
              ;

speaker: PISTOL
text:
Give
               
              fire
              !
               
              She
               
              is
               
              my
               
              prize
              ,
               
              or
               
              ocean
               
              whelm
               
              them
               
              all
              !

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Sayst thou so, old Jack? Go thy ways. I’ll

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: make more of thy old body than I have done. Will

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: they yet look after thee? Wilt thou, after the expense

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: of so much money, be now a gainer? Good

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: body, I thank thee. Let them say ’tis grossly done;

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: so it be fairly done, no matter.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Sir John, there’s one Master Brook below

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: would fain speak with you and be acquainted with

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: you, and hath sent your Worship a morning’s

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: draught of sack.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Brook is his name?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Ay, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Call him in. Such Brooks are welcome to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: me that o’erflows such liquor.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ah ha, Mistress Ford and Mistress Page, have I encompassed

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: you? Go to. Via!

speaker: FORD
text: God bless you, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: And you, sir. Would you speak with me?

speaker: FORD
text: I make bold to press with so little

speaker: FORD
text: preparation upon you.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: You’re welcome. What’s your will?—Give us

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: leave, drawer.

speaker: FORD
text: Sir, I am a gentleman that have spent

speaker: FORD
text: much. My name is Brook.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Good Master Brook, I desire more acquaintance

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: of you.

speaker: FORD
text: Good Sir John, I sue for yours—not

speaker: FORD
text: to charge you, for I must let you understand I

speaker: FORD
text: think myself in better plight for a lender than you

speaker: FORD
text: are, the which hath something emboldened me to

speaker: FORD
text: this unseasoned intrusion; for they say, if money

speaker: FORD
text: go before, all ways do lie open.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Money is a good soldier, sir, and will on.

speaker: FORD
text: Troth, and I have a bag of money

speaker: FORD
text:
here troubles me.
                 
                He
                 
                sets
                 
                it
                 
                down
                .
               If you will help

speaker: FORD
text: to bear it, Sir John, take all, or half, for easing me

speaker: FORD
text: of the carriage.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Sir, I know not how I may deserve to be your

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: porter.

speaker: FORD
text: I will tell you, sir, if you will give me

speaker: FORD
text: the hearing.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Speak, good Master Brook. I shall be glad

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: to be your servant.

speaker: FORD
text: Sir, I hear you are a scholar—I will

speaker: FORD
text: be brief with you—and you have been a man long

speaker: FORD
text: known to me, though I had never so good means

speaker: FORD
text: as desire to make myself acquainted with you. I

speaker: FORD
text: shall discover a thing to you wherein I must very

speaker: FORD
text: much lay open mine own imperfection. But, good

speaker: FORD
text: Sir John, as you have one eye upon my follies, as

speaker: FORD
text: you hear them unfolded, turn another into the register

speaker: FORD
text: of your own, that I may pass with a reproof

speaker: FORD
text: the easier, sith you yourself know how easy it is to

speaker: FORD
text: be such an offender.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Very well, sir. Proceed.

speaker: FORD
text: There is a gentlewoman in this

speaker: FORD
text: town—her husband’s name is Ford.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, sir.

speaker: FORD
text: I have long loved her and, I protest

speaker: FORD
text: to you, bestowed much on her, followed her with

speaker: FORD
text: a doting observance, engrossed opportunities to

speaker: FORD
text: meet her, fee’d every slight occasion that could but

speaker: FORD
text: niggardly give me sight of her, not only bought

speaker: FORD
text: many presents to give her, but have given largely to

speaker: FORD
text: many to know what she would have given. Briefly,

speaker: FORD
text: I have pursued her as love hath pursued me, which

speaker: FORD
text: hath been on the wing of all occasions. But whatsoever

speaker: FORD
text: I have merited, either in my mind or in my

speaker: FORD
text: means, meed I am sure I have received none, unless

speaker: FORD
text: experience be a jewel. That I have purchased

speaker: FORD
text: at an infinite rate, and that hath taught me to say

speaker: FORD
text: this:

speaker: FORD
text:
“
              Love
               
              like
               
              a
               
              shadow
               
              flies
               
              when
               
              substance
               
              love
               
              pursues
              ,

speaker: FORD
text:
Pursuing
               
              that
               
              that
               
              flies
              ,
               
              and
               
              flying
               
              what
               
              pursues
              .
              ”

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Have you received no promise of satisfaction

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: at her hands?

speaker: FORD
text: Never.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Have you importuned her to such a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: purpose?

speaker: FORD
text: Never.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Of what quality was your love, then?

speaker: FORD
text: Like a fair house built on another

speaker: FORD
text: man’s ground, so that I have lost my edifice by

speaker: FORD
text: mistaking the place where I erected it.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: To what purpose have you unfolded this to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: me?

speaker: FORD
text: When I have told you that, I have

speaker: FORD
text: told you all. Some say that though she appear honest

speaker: FORD
text: to me, yet in other places she enlargeth her

speaker: FORD
text: mirth so far that there is shrewd construction

speaker: FORD
text: made of her. Now, Sir John, here is the heart of my

speaker: FORD
text: purpose: you are a gentleman of excellent breeding,

speaker: FORD
text: admirable discourse, of great admittance,

speaker: FORD
text: authentic in your place and person, generally

speaker: FORD
text: allowed for your many warlike, courtlike, and

speaker: FORD
text: learned preparations.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: O, sir!

speaker: FORD
text: Believe it, for you know it. There is

speaker: FORD
text:
money.
                 
                (
                He
                 
                points
                 
                to
                 
                the
                 
                bag
                .
                )
               Spend it, spend

speaker: FORD
text: it, spend more; spend all I have. Only give me so

speaker: FORD
text: much of your time in exchange of it as to lay an

speaker: FORD
text: amiable siege to the honesty of this Ford’s wife.

speaker: FORD
text: Use your art of wooing; win her to consent to you.

speaker: FORD
text: If any man may, you may as soon as any.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Would it apply well to the vehemency of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: your affection that I should win what you would

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: enjoy? Methinks you prescribe to yourself very

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: preposterously.

speaker: FORD
text: O, understand my drift. She dwells

speaker: FORD
text: so securely on the excellency of her honor that the

speaker: FORD
text: folly of my soul dares not present itself; she is too

speaker: FORD
text: bright to be looked against. Now, could I come to

speaker: FORD
text: her with any detection in my hand, my desires had

speaker: FORD
text: instance and argument to commend themselves. I

speaker: FORD
text: could drive her then from the ward of her purity,

speaker: FORD
text: her reputation, her marriage vow, and a thousand

speaker: FORD
text: other her defenses, which now are too too strongly

speaker: FORD
text: embattled against me. What say you to ’t, Sir

speaker: FORD
text: John?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Master Brook, I will first

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: make bold with your money; next, give me your

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: hand; and, last, as I am a gentleman, you shall, if

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: you will, enjoy Ford’s wife.

speaker: FORD
text: O, good sir!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I say you shall.

speaker: FORD
text: Want no money, Sir John; you shall

speaker: FORD
text: want none.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Want no Mistress Ford, Master Brook; you

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: shall want none. I shall be with her, I may tell you,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: by her own appointment. Even as you came in to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: me, her assistant or go-between parted from me. I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: say I shall be with her between ten and eleven, for

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: at that time the jealous, rascally knave her husband

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: will be forth. Come you to me at night. You

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: shall know how I speed.

speaker: FORD
text: I am blessed in your acquaintance.

speaker: FORD
text: Do you know Ford, sir?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Hang him, poor cuckoldly knave! I know

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: him not. Yet I wrong him to call him poor. They

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: say the jealous wittolly knave hath masses of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: money, for the which his wife seems to me well-favored.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I will use her as the key of the cuckoldly

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: rogue’s coffer, and there’s my harvest home.

speaker: FORD
text: I would you knew Ford, sir, that you

speaker: FORD
text: might avoid him if you saw him.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Hang him, mechanical salt-butter rogue! I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: will stare him out of his wits. I will awe him with

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my cudgel; it shall hang like a meteor o’er the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: cuckold’s horns. Master Brook, thou shalt know I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: will predominate over the peasant, and thou shalt

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: lie with his wife. Come to me soon at night. Ford’s

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: a knave, and I will aggravate his style. Thou, Master

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Brook, shalt know him for knave and cuckold.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come to me soon at night.

speaker: FORD
text: What a damned epicurean rascal is this! My

speaker: FORD
text: heart is ready to crack with impatience. Who says

speaker: FORD
text: this is improvident jealousy? My wife hath sent

speaker: FORD
text: to him, the hour is fixed, the match is made.

speaker: FORD
text: Would any man have thought this? See the hell of

speaker: FORD
text: having a false woman: my bed shall be abused, my

speaker: FORD
text: coffers ransacked, my reputation gnawn at. And

speaker: FORD
text: I shall not only receive this villainous wrong but

speaker: FORD
text: stand under the adoption of abominable terms,

speaker: FORD
text: and by him that does me this wrong. Terms,

speaker: FORD
text: names! “Amaimon” sounds well, “Lucifer” well,

speaker: FORD
text: “Barbason” well; yet they are devils’ additions, the

speaker: FORD
text: names of fiends. But “Cuckold,” “Wittoll,” “Cuckold”!

speaker: FORD
text: The devil himself hath not such a name. Page

speaker: FORD
text: is an ass, a secure ass. He will trust his wife, he will

speaker: FORD
text: not be jealous. I will rather trust a Fleming with

speaker: FORD
text: my butter, Parson Hugh the Welshman with my

speaker: FORD
text: cheese, an Irishman with my aquavitae bottle, or

speaker: FORD
text: a thief to walk my ambling gelding, than my wife

speaker: FORD
text: with herself. Then she plots, then she ruminates,

speaker: FORD
text: then she devises; and what they think in their

speaker: FORD
text: hearts they may effect, they will break their hearts

speaker: FORD
text: but they will effect. God be praised for my jealousy!

speaker: FORD
text: Eleven o’clock the hour. I will prevent this,

speaker: FORD
text: detect my wife, be revenged on Falstaff, and laugh

speaker: FORD
text: at Page. I will about it. Better three hours too soon

speaker: FORD
text: than a minute too late. Fie, fie, fie! Cuckold, cuckold,

speaker: FORD
text: cuckold!
